Control Name: Maintain strict control over the internal or external distribution of any kind of media, including the following:\nEnsure management approves any and all media that is moved from a secured area (including when media is distributed to individuals).

control_attributes.Control: Maintain strict control over the internal or external distribution of any kind of media, including the following:\nEnsure management approves any and all media that is moved from a secured area (including when media is distributed to individuals).
control_attributes.Requirement: 9.6.3. Restrict physical access to cardholder data
